meanings.definition: A person who leaves trash in a public place.
meanings.sent1: The litterers left their garbage on the park benches.
meanings.sent2: We should all work together to keep our city clean and free from litterers.
meanings.sent3: The litterers must have thought the park was their personal trash can!
meanings.sent4: The streets were filled with litterers, turning the city into a garbage dump.
meanings.sent5: The image of the litterers tossing their trash carelessly stayed in my mind.

meanings.sent1: It's important to educate people about the harm caused by litterers.
meanings.sent2: The litterers in our neighborhood have been causing a lot of pollution.
meanings.sent3: The litterers seemed to believe that the ground had magical trash-eating powers.
meanings.sent4: The river was a victim of the litterers' thoughtless actions.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to clean up after the litterers' mess.
